SEARCH
Package Model.EntityModel

Class Player

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
Model.EntityModel.Entity
Model.EntityModel.Player
public class Player extends Entity
this class represents the player in the game. Manages the player's actions and state. The bombs in play are associated with the Player
See Also:
  • Entity

    • intersect

      private boolean intersect(String dir)
      For each bomb in the game it checks whether the Player collided with the bomb.
      Parameters:
      dir - : direction in which the player is moving
      Returns:
      returns true if the player hits a bomb

    • spawnBomb

      private void spawnBomb()
      this method creates a bomb. First it is checked whether the player has reached the maximum possible number of bombs. At this point he sees whether the position in which he wants to place this bomb is legal or not. If the location is legal then a bomb is generated and the value of BOMB_COUNTER is increased.

    • explodeBomb

      public void explodeBomb(Bomb b)
      This method detonates the bomb
      Parameters:
      b - : Exploding Bomb

    • removeBomb

      public void removeBomb(Bomb b)
      After the bomb's explosion is finished, this method removes it from the game
      Parameters:
      b - : bomb to remove from the array
